subject: Displaying contents shares on samba3
body:
I'm using samba 3.0.24. I create my Makefile for cross compiling only smbd
and nmbd. The problem is that I can't display the contents of my shares.
When I try to connect from any other PC I get the follow log message :


connect to service my share initially as user root (uid=0, gid=0) (pid 1194)
smbd/service.c:close_cnum(1150)
(192.168.1.13) closed connection to service my share
couldn't find service ::{2227a280-3aea-1069-a2de-08002b30309d}
-- 
View this message in context: http://www.nabble.com/Displaying-contents-shares-on-samba3-tf3637745.html#a10158163
Sent from the Samba - samba-technical mailing list archive at Nabble.com.
